https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/wIR2Rsj8QtDDSeVasbO2RnHX5L0.jpg A group of archeologists are determined to make digs on a ghost town to find an old book, ignoring that the town is cursed due to events occurred about seven hundred years ago. An evil spirit comes to haunt this team... Büyü
